description:
This scene unfolds as Cody and Wade are about to head out to the club to find some hot chics to bring back to their place.

As Cody gets dressed, Wade sits behind him, waiting for his buddy to get done. Cody notices he's being lusted after. When Cody asks his friends what's up, Wade denies that he's looking at him in 'that way'.After some convincing, Cody gets Wade to put his cock in his mouth. Wade isn't a huge fan of cock, but he has been known to hook up with a guy or two.

Cody gets his huge dick sucked until Wade jerks him to the point of cuming all over his face.Once cleaned off, the two head to the club.

Enjoy!
title: Horny Cody cums all over his friend's face
